review:
1) There are not many feedback's posted by others about this doctor, i made my decision to visit this doctor only by seeing his experience and the some of his detailed videos on social media, which help me made my decision
2) Doctor was super simple, down to earth and mostly importantly LISTENING to our history and problems with utmost patience.
3) Doctor was clear with his decisions and gave us the reasons for those decisions. Most importantly, his prescription was super clear with course of medicine.
4) The Treat Mill Technician took 2 hours to show up at the hospital, which is the only thing we didn't liked.

I am the patient  under his medical care for the past fifteen years , which started with Angioplasty with stunt. Till today, I am getting his best medical advice on all my cardiovascular problems & having mental peace on my health issues under his care.üëç
